thread.title: Mr Alan Tooth
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Mr Alan Tooth

author: Mr Alan Tooth
title: Mr Alan Tooth
text: Arranged to have my tyre done between 2pm and 4pm as I was at work. Received an email in the morning confirming this and then got a phone call at 12pm asking if I was available then as they had a cancellation. Informed them that I was at work till 1pm and that I would be home at around 1:30 pm and they said no problem we will see you then. I arrived home at 1:30 and to my surprise they was there waiting. My tyre was done within 20 mins and the two chaps were polite and friendly. I couldn't believe how quick and easy it was to arrange this and how quickly it was completed. Highly recommended, Thank you 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
